comments.body: Really doesn't matter, but you could flip the comparison here to avoid the negation
agreed, it definitely will look better.  will change in next commit.  thanks!

Actually now I look at the existing `putIntsLittleEndian()` and `putLongsLittleEndian()` methods and they do `if (!bigEndianPlatform)` as well (and thus how I copied and pasted from those).

@srowen Do you think we can leave the negation alone for uniformity, or go ahead and change?

Just leave it as-is for consistency, yeah. OK I see we have lots of "as little endian" variants so maybe this is the best approach for symmetry.

I dont' really know enough about this part to validate the change but it seems plausible.
